LandingPage.Body: Welcome to the recruitment page for the amusement park. Log in as a recruiter to view existing applications, or register as an applicant.

PrivateRoute.DeniedBody: You do not have the required role for this page

Errors.LackingPermission: Lacking permission to view that resource
Errors.ConcurrentModification: The current application is being modified by another user
Errors.NonUniqueEmail: That email is already in use
Errors.NonUniqueUsername: That username is already in use
Errors.NonUniquePnr: That person number is already in use
Errors.InvalidUsername: That is not a valid username, it needs to be at least 4 characters long
Errors.InvalidPnr: That is not a valid person number
Errors.InvalidFirstName: That is not a valid first name
Errors.InvallidLastName: That is not a valid last name
Errors.InvalidEmail: That is not a valid email
Errors.InvalidPassword: That is not a valid password, it needs to be at least 4 characters long
Errors.InvalidStatus: The status must either be unhandled, rejected or accepted
Errors.InvalidVersion: An error occurred, try refreshing the page
